description: Central configuration for all game balance values. These values are used by both the simulator and web game. This is the AUTHORITATIVE SOURCE for all conversion rates, costs, and timing values.

stat_point_system.description: Conversion rates for stat point budgets

heal_regen.description: 1 stat point = 0.1 HP/sec regen (until next enemy)

Arcane_Student.description: Starter class with tight deck limit (forces choices at Pack 1)

Arcane_Pack.description: Foundation tier packs, lower rarity rates

Elemental_Pack.description: Specialized tier packs, better rarity rates

Premium_Pack.description: Special packs with best rarity rates

leveling_system.description: Universal leveling system - all cards use identical mechanics, difficulty comes from drop rate frequency

base_leveling.description: Linear progression: Level 2 needs 1 dup, Level 3 needs 2 more, Level 4 needs 3 more, etc.
base_leveling.note: All rarities use same formula - Commons level faster due to higher drop rates

awakening_system.description: Post-Level-10 progression using scrap currency from maxed card duplicates
awakening_system.scrap_generation: 1 scrap per duplicate of maxed (Level 10) card, scrap rarity matches card rarity

awakening_effects.secondary_effect: Adds utility or synergy effect at Level 15 (card-specific design)
awakening_effects.transformative_effect: Deck-defining mechanical transformation at Level 20 (card-specific design)

awakening_system.note: Awakening is late-game individual card prestige layer, requires significant duplicate accumulation

Elemental_Pack.note: Slightly more expensive than Arcane, better rarity rates

player_stats.description: HP upgrades via shards, no auto-regen

enemy_scaling.description: Enemy stats scale dynamically per combat tick to maintain threat throughout fights

act_2.description: Challenge tier, step up from Act 1

act_3.description: Master tier, step up from Act 2

act_4.description: Future content, balanced with elemental tiers

hp.description: Boss HP multipliers at milestone enemies

per_tick_rates.description: Bosses scale 2x faster per tick than regular enemies

per_tick_scaling.description: Enemy ATK/DEF grow each combat tick to counter player deck cycling

act_1.description: Starting values = first tick values (no offset)

act_2.description: Faster per-tick scaling to match improved player decks

design_rationale.per_tick_system: Enemies gain ATK/DEF each combat tick to counter player's exponential stat growth from deck cycling
design_rationale.no_default_invulnerability: Prevents defense from trivializing all fights; requires build investment for defensive strategies
design_rationale.graduated_scaling: Per-tick rates grow with enemy number, creating smooth difficulty curve
design_rationale.boss_scaling: Bosses scale 2x faster per tick, making long fights extremely dangerous

enemy_1.note: Slower than player deck cycling (~6.9 ATK/tick, ~6.2 DEF/tick with starter)

enemy_50_regular.note: Player outpaces, winnable with starter deck

enemy_50_boss.note: Matches player DEF growth, very dangerous

enemy_150_boss.note: Much faster than player, requires Packs 1-3 and defensive investment
